shortdesc.ph: Sets whether the SDK's recording device follows the system default recording device.
Sets whether the audio recording device used by the SDK follows the system default recording device.
Sets whether the audio recording device used by the SDK follows the system default audio recording device.

section.note: This method is applicable to Windows and macOS only.

plentry.pd:
Whether to follow the system default recording device:
: Follow. When the system default recording device changes, the SDK immediately switches the recording device.
: Do not follow. The SDK switches to the system default recording device only when the current recording device is removed.

Whether to follow the system default audio recording device:
: Follow. When the system default recording device changes, the SDK immediately switches the recording device.
: Do not follow. The SDK switches to the system default recording device only when the current recording device is removed.

Whether to follow the system default audio recording device:
: Follow. When the system default audio recording device changes, the SDK immediately switches to it.
: Do not follow. The SDK switches to the system default audio recording device only when the current device used by the SDK is removed.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
